channel.title: Projects on Matthew do Santos-Zounon
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Matthew do Santos-Zounon

item.title: Minimal Terminal Portfolio
item.description:
Rebuilt this site around a lean Hugo + Terminal stack:

  • Simplified navigation to the essentials (Projects, About, Contact).
  • Kept the footprint light while keeping the CNAME and GitHub Pages flow intact.
  • Wrote content-first sections to replace the old Bootstrap build.

item.title: KAMI
item.description:
Built a minimalist note + task workspace focused on speed:

  • Designed a pared-down UI with keyboard-first navigation.
  • Implemented syncing and local caching to stay responsive offline.
  • Added quick capture and search so everything stays one keystroke away.

item.title: Device Repair Guides
item.description:
Created concise repair guides that pair photos with step-by-step instructions:

  • Broke complex repairs into clear, verifiable steps.
  • Shot and edited process photos to match each step.
  • Published to help classmates and friends revive their hardware instead of replacing it.
